item.title: Why BeyondTrust Password Safe is a Critical Tool for IT Security Professionals üîê
item.description: BeyondTrust Password Safe is a comprehensive Privileged Access Management (PAM) solution focused on the secure management of privileged credentials. As cybercriminals increasingly target high-value accounts with elevated privileges, organizations need solutions that control access and reduce the risk of credential theft. BeyondTrust Password Safe helps secure the entire lifecycle of privileged accounts, from secure password storage to automatic password rotation and auditing, providing unparalleled control and visibility into privileged access.
